content: I am- unfortunately- in Matt Gaetz’s district. I attended the protest at his town hall meeting. You have to remember, this is THE most conservative part of Florida. We had between 300 and 400 people come out to 3 different events. We chanted and held up signs and let him kn0w that we need the EPA. He is not what you would call a smart person, but I think we made an impression on him.
